title: Little brother saw a LoL Ad
body:
So I woke up to my mom texting me saying that my little brother(Who is currently nine) raving about a League of Legends ad he saw on Adult swim (I think toonami? He LOVES Boruto and Dragonball) well he was going on and on about how I always played league and thought that the ad looked super cool and that his big sister played it, how he wants to play it too soon. I just thought it was amazing how its interested him as well, I mean I started playing the game right around the time he was born so it baffles me. I always thought ads were annoying but this time I am pretty grateful <3 
{{sticker:sg-kiko}}
